server.facade

Interface IGamesFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerFacade, MockServerFacade, ServerFacade

    public interface IGamesFacade
    An interface detailing all of the actions that can take place on the Server Side for all Games.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreateGameResponse createGame(boolean randomTiles, boolean randomNumbers, boolean randomPorts, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a game with the given properties.
      java.lang.String joinGame(int player, int gameID, CatanColor color)
      Places a player in the given game, if it exists.
      ListGamesResponse listGames()
      Returns a list of Games on the server.

    • Method Detail

      • listGames

        ListGamesResponse listGames()
        Returns a list of Games on the server.
        Returns:
        a list of games on the server.

      • joinGame

        java.lang.String joinGame(int player,
                          int gameID,
                          CatanColor color)
                   throws GameQueryException
        Places a player in the given game, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        player - the player joining the game.
        gameID - the id of the game to join.
        color - the color that the player is joining with.
        Throws:
        GameQueryException

      • createGame

        CreateGameResponse createGame(boolean randomTiles,
                              boolean randomNumbers,
                              boolean randomPorts,
                              java.lang.String name)
        Creates a game with the given properties.
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - whether or not the created game will have random hexes.
        randomNumbers - whether or not the hexes in the created game will have randomly placed numbers.
        randomPorts - whether or not the created game's ports will be randomly picked.
        name - the name of the game.
        Returns:
        a CreateGameResponse with the created game's info.
